title: Full-Stack Web Development with Laravel & Vue.js
description: Master backend and frontend development using Laravel and Vue.js in this hands-on course.

title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals for Beginners
description: Understand the basics of cybersecurity, including threat detection and risk management.

title: Python Programming for Data Science
description: Learn Python and its data science libraries like Pandas and NumPy through real-world projects.

title: Web Application Development with Django
description: Build scalable web apps using Django and PostgreSQL with a focus on RESTful APIs.

title: Ethical Hacking and Network Security
description: Advanced training in penetration testing and network defense using Kali Linux and Metasploit.

title: JavaScript for Modern Web Interfaces
description: Learn JavaScript ES6+ and build dynamic, interactive web interfaces with DOM manipulation.

title: Responsive Web Design with HTML & CSS
description: Design mobile-friendly websites using Flexbox, Grid, and modern CSS techniques.

title: Advanced PHP and MySQL Web Development
description: Build secure and scalable web applications using PHP 8 and MySQL 8.

title: Introduction to Cloud Security
description: Explore cloud security principles, IAM, and compliance frameworks like ISO 27001 and NIST.

title: React.js Frontend Development
description: Build modern single-page applications using React, JSX, and React Router.

title: Mastering TypeScript for Scalable Applications
description: Deep dive into TypeScript to build large-scale, maintainable JavaScript applications.

title: Intro to Web Accessibility
description: Learn how to make websites accessible to users with disabilities using WCAG standards.

title: Secure Web Development with OWASP
description: Protect your web apps by learning OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities and mitigation techniques.

title: Building APIs with FastAPI and Python
description: Create high-performance RESTful APIs using FastAPI and asynchronous Python.

title: Cybersecurity for Web Developers
description: Understand how to secure web applications from common threats and attacks.

title: Intro to Git and Version Control
description: Learn Git fundamentals, branching, merging, and collaboration on GitHub.

title: DevSecOps Essentials
description: Integrate security into DevOps pipelines using tools like SonarQube and Snyk.

title: Vue.js 3 Crash Course
description: Build reactive web interfaces using Vue 3 Composition API and Vue Router.

title: Intro to SQL and Relational Databases
description: Master SQL queries, joins, and database design using MySQL and PostgreSQL.

title: Penetration Testing with Metasploit
description: Learn ethical hacking techniques using Metasploit Framework and Kali Linux.

title: Intro to Java Programming
description: Learn Java syntax, OOP principles, and build console-based applications.

title: Building Web Apps with Flask
description: Create lightweight web apps using Flask, Jinja2, and SQLite.

title: Cloud Security with AWS
description: Secure AWS environments using IAM, VPCs, and encryption best practices.

title: Intro to Responsive UI with Tailwind CSS
description: Design beautiful, responsive UIs using Tailwind CSS utility classes.

title: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures
description: Implement classic algorithms and data structures in JavaScript for interviews.
